players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
You: "I am innocent and I did not kill Bob. Alice has made a mistake in her investigation."
Diana: "I think Alice made a mistake in her investigation. Charlie didn't kill Bob, and I believe he is innocent."
